author: Nour Alakraa
title: Syria and Russia Strike Eastern Ghouta Despite Promise of Pause
text:
Syrian regime forces and their Russian allies conducted airstrikes Tuesday on an area on the outskirts of Damascus despite Moscow’s promise of a “humanitarian pause” in the fighting, according to residents.
Despite voting in favor of a United Nations resolution for a 30-day cease-fire over the weekend, Moscow has declined to implement it, saying instead it is working with Syrian forces to organize daily five-hour truces to allow civilians and the sick and wounded to evacuate Eastern Ghouta through a “humanitarian corridor.”
... RELATED VIDEO Syria's White Helmet Rescuers Capture Destruction in Eastern Ghouta Cameras worn by Syria’s White Helmet rescuers document the government forces' attacks on rebel-held Eastern Ghouta. Photo: Mohammed Badra/EPA-EFE
